Chunsheng Mei

Master of Science
School of Electronics and Information
Northwestern Polytechnical University

Chunsheng Mei is a third year master student in School of Electronics and Information at Northwestern Polytechnical University, under the supervision of Prof. Zhou Wei. He also received his B.Eng degree from Northwestern Polytechnical University in 2015.

He is interested in developing algorithms for image/video processing. Currently, he is working on Person Re-identification by using convolutional neural-network.
